languages.text: {n}Старуха вздрагивает.{/n} "Нет, разумеется нет! Если вы, {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}преж{mf|ний|няя} служитель{mf||ница} Экклезиархии{/d}, узрели ересь в губернаторе... Я лишь хочу сказать, что ваше праведное решение отразится на подати с Тассеры. Таковы факты, я лишь констатирую их".

{n}The old woman shudders.{/n} "No! Of course not! If, as a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}former servant of the Ecclesiarchy{/d}, you saw heresy in the governor... I am only saying that your righteous decision is going to affect the Thassera tithe. That is a fact, and I am merely stating it."
languages.original_text: {n}Старуха вздрагивает.{/n} "Нет, разумеется нет! Если вы, {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}преж{mf|ний|няя} служитель{mf||ница} Экклезиархии{/d}, узрели ересь в губернаторе... Я лишь хочу сказать, что ваше праведное решение отразится на подати с Тассеры. Таковы факты, я лишь констатирую их".

I am only saying that your righteous decision is going to affect the Thassera tithe. That is a fact, and I am merely stating it."

{n}The old woman shudders.{/n} "No! Of course not! If, as a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}former servant of the Ecclesiarchy{/d}, you saw heresy in the governor... I am only saying that your righteous decision is going to affect the Thassera tithe. That is a fact, and I am merely stating it."

{n}The old woman shudders.{/n} "No! Of course not! If, as a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}former servant of the Ecclesiarchy{/d}, you saw heresy in the governor... I am only saying that your righteous decision is going to affect the Thassera tithe. That is a fact, and I am merely stating it."

languages.text: {n}Die alte Frau erschauert.{/n} "Nein! Natürlich nicht! Wenn Ihr als {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}früherer Diener der Ekklesiarchie{/d} Ketzerei bei einem Gouverneur bemerkt ... Ich sage nur, dass Eure rechtschaffene Entscheidung Einfluss auf den Zehnt von Thassera haben wird. Das ist eine Tatsache, die ich lediglich ausspreche."
languages.original_text: {n}The old woman shudders.{/n} "No! Of course not! If, as a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}former servant of the Ecclesiarchy{/d}, you saw heresy in the governor... I am only saying that your righteous decision is going to affect the Thassera tithe. That is a fact, and I am merely stating it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die alte Frau erschauert.{/n} "Nein! Natürlich nicht! Wenn Ihr als {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}früherer Diener der Ekklesiarchie{/d} Ketzerei bei einem Gouverneur bemerkt ... Ich sage nur, dass Eure rechtschaffene Entscheidung Einfluss auf den Zehnt von Thassera haben wird. Das ist eine Tatsache, die ich lediglich ausspreche."

languages.text: {n}La vieille femme frémit.{/n} « Non ! Bien sûr que non ! Si, en tant qu'{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}{mf|ancien serviteur|ancienne servante} de l'Ecclésiarchie{/d}, vous avez jugé que le gouverneur était coupable d'hérésie... Je voulais simplement souligner l'impact que votre décision, si pertinente soit-elle, aura sur la dîme de Thassera. C'est un simple constat, et non pas une mise en accusation. »
languages.original_text: {n}The old woman shudders.{/n} "No! Of course not! If, as a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}former servant of the Ecclesiarchy{/d}, you saw heresy in the governor... I am only saying that your righteous decision is going to affect the Thassera tithe. That is a fact, and I am merely stating it."

traits.locale_text: {n}La vieille femme frémit.{/n} « Non ! Bien sûr que non ! Si, en tant qu'{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}{mf|ancien serviteur|ancienne servante} de l'Ecclésiarchie{/d}, vous avez jugé que le gouverneur était coupable d'hérésie... Je voulais simplement souligner l'impact que votre décision, si pertinente soit-elle, aura sur la dîme de Thassera. C'est un simple constat, et non pas une mise en accusation. »

languages.text: {n}老妇人颤抖着开了口。{/n}“不！当然不是！您{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}以前是帝国国教的仆人{/d}，您确实看到了那位总督的异端恶行……我只是想说，您这个基于正义的决定，会影响到塔瑟拉的什一税工作。这是事实，我仅仅是阐述一下这个事实而已。”
languages.original_text: {n}The old woman shudders.{/n} "No! Of course not! If, as a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}former servant of the Ecclesiarchy{/d}, you saw heresy in the governor... I am only saying that your righteous decision is going to affect the Thassera tithe. That is a fact, and I am merely stating it."

traits.locale_text: {n}老妇人颤抖着开了口。{/n}“不！当然不是！您{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}以前是帝国国教的仆人{/d}，您确实看到了那位总督的异端恶行……我只是想说，您这个基于正义的决定，会影响到塔瑟拉的什一税工作。这是事实，我仅仅是阐述一下这个事实而已。”

languages.text: {n}La anciana se estremece.{/n} «¡No! ¡Por supuesto que no! Si, como {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}antigu{mf|o|a} sirviente de la Eclesiarquía{/d}, detectó herejía en el gobernador... Solo digo que su justa decisión afectará al diezmo de Thassera. Eso es un hecho; yo solo lo menciono».
languages.original_text: {n}The old woman shudders.{/n} "No! Of course not! If, as a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}former servant of the Ecclesiarchy{/d}, you saw heresy in the governor... I am only saying that your righteous decision is going to affect the Thassera tithe. That is a fact, and I am merely stating it."

traits.locale_text: {n}La anciana se estremece.{/n} «¡No! ¡Por supuesto que no! Si, como {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}antigu{mf|o|a} sirviente de la Eclesiarquía{/d}, detectó herejía en el gobernador... Solo digo que su justa decisión afectará al diezmo de Thassera. Eso es un hecho; yo solo lo menciono».

languages.text: {n}老女は身震いした。{/n}「いいえ！もちろんそんなはずはありません！{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}元帝国聖教会の奉仕者{/d}として、あなたが総督に異端を見出したというなら…私はただ、あなたの正当な判断がタッセーラの租税に影響を及ぼすという事実を述べているだけです」
languages.original_text: {n}The old woman shudders.{/n} "No! Of course not! If, as a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}former servant of the Ecclesiarchy{/d}, you saw heresy in the governor... I am only saying that your righteous decision is going to affect the Thassera tithe. That is a fact, and I am merely stating it."

traits.locale_text: {n}老女は身震いした。{/n}「いいえ！もちろんそんなはずはありません！{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}元帝国聖教会の奉仕者{/d}として、あなたが総督に異端を見出したというなら…私はただ、あなたの正当な判断がタッセーラの租税に影響を及ぼすという事実を述べているだけです」

languages.text: {n}Yaşlı kadın ürperiyor.{/n} "Hayır! Olur mu öyle şey? Eğer {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}Ekleşiarşi'nin eski bir hizmetkârı olarak{/d} valinin günah işlediğini gördüyseniz... Demek istediğim, sizin bu haklı kararınızın Thassera'nın aşarına da etki edeceğidir. Bu bir gerçek, bense sadece bunu dile getiriyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}The old woman shudders.{/n} "No! Of course not! If, as a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Ministorum}former servant of the Ecclesiarchy{/d}, you saw heresy in the governor... I am only saying that your righteous decision is going to affect the Thassera tithe. That is a fact, and I am merely stating it."

Demek istediğim, sizin bu haklı kararınızın Thassera'nın aşarına da etki edeceğidir. Bu bir gerçek, bense sadece bunu dile getiriyorum."
